nodes.text: Javyar's Cantina was a cantina located in the Lower City of Taris. An atrium with a set of pazaak tables led into the main bar. Zax's bounty office was located in one wing and a stage with dancers and music was in the wing opposite. It was a popular hangout and was frequented by such people as Lyn Sekla, Uriah, Holdan, Gelrood, Mission Vao, Zaalbar, Canderous Ordo, and Calo Nord.
